mapper.insert: insert into calendar(manager, title, content, rdate, wdate, tag) values (#{manager}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rdate}, now(), #{tag})
mapper.select: select * from calendar where manager=#{manager} and substr(rdate, 1, 8)=#{rdate} order by rdate asc
select * from calendar where substr(rdate, 1, 8)=#{rdate} order by rdate asc
select count(*) from calendar WHERE rdate LIKE CONCAT(#{rdate}, '%')
